body:
Greg sent an email semi-recently about the 2010 Radiance Workshop:


"We have been discussing dates for the workshop, and so far, our
favorites are:
September 22nd-24th (Wed-Fri)


Second choice dates would be:
October 6th-8th (also Wed.-Fri.)"


Just a note to mention that the International Association of Lighting
Designers' annual conference is Oct 7-9, which makes me like the first
choice of dates better. Not sure if this has been set yet.


- Rob
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2010-April/006776.html).</sup>
